Nerangs.ab: ParagnaLL2.2.3 Var. a (Mss. K7, RJ, RKS):
pas dō yaθā ahū vairiiō guftan pe š́iiaoθənanąm be-dasturi-ye kosti gereh afgandan aŋhə̄uš mazdā xšaθəmcā tā sar guftan
"Then he should recite two Yaθā ahū Vairiiō and tie knots in the way doing with the kosti and recite aŋhə̄uš mazdā xšaθəmcā until the end."
va yaθā ahū vairiiō do goftan va fe š́iiaoθənanąm do gere čin fe kosti avar barsom afgandan.
"He should recite two Yaθā Ahū Vairiiō and at š́iiaoθənanąm he should tie two knots over the barsom like for the kosti."

Quotations.ab: u-š *frāgām pad sar abāz nihišn u-š aṣ̌əm vohū ēk-ē be gōwišn u- š aiwyānghan-ē pērāmōn āwarišn u-š ẏaθā ahū vairiiō ĪĪ bē gōwišn u-š pad š́iiaōθananąm grih ī *gaštag bē kunišn barsom pad 5 [3 azēr ud 2 azabar] grih *pardazišn ō bahr ī azēr ast kē ēdōn gōwēd ay hād andar srišwadag ī mayānag harw gyāg-ē kū bast estēd ā šāyēd. Ast kē ēdōn gōwēd ay hād *az ān ĪĪ [bahr ī azabar] ka ašem-ē *wohū-z kam ā nē šāyēd *wišād ō dašn ud bālēn ō hōy; ka nē owōn ā nē xūb. Ka dō grih ā nē šāyēd.

"And one should place the frāgām back on top of these, and pray one a.v. and wind a leaf tie around it, pray y.a.v. (2) and tie a firm (?) knot on it at (the word) š́iiaoθananąm. The barsom is to be finished with five knots [[3 underneath and 2 on top]] on the lower part. There is one who says thus: "If he tied it in the middle third (part of the barsom), it is permissible wherever he tied it." There is one who says thus: "If of those two [[on the upper part]] one aṣ̌em vohū is omitted it is not permissible." The open part (of the barsom should be) on the right and the top (?) on the left; if it is not like this it is not good. If there are (only) two knots it is not permissible."
